message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I really like the product, but I'm on a budget.

I understand you're on a budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $17000. I think you'll find it's a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13500. I'm willing to make another concession, so I'll counteroffer at $16000. I think this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
